attributes.title: Commodity Chain Analysis- Bridgestone Truck Tire
attributes.description:
This is a map representing the global production locations of the Bridgestone truck tire.  This illustrates the geographies of the different stages and processes involved.
This is fairly detailed, but if zoomed in, each location can be expanded and more clearly viewed.
Regional office of Bridgestone.  This is their North American office.
attributes.title: Tennesse Regional Office

attributes.description: Regional office of Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Zaventem Regional Office

attributes.description: One of Bridgestone's regional offices.
attributes.title: Dubai Regional Office

attributes.description: One of Bridgestone's regional offices.
attributes.title: Shingapore Regional Office

attributes.description: One of Bridgestone's regional offices.
attributes.title: Shanghai, China- Regional Office

attributes.description: Fifteen tire manufacturing plants throughout North America operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: North American Tire Manufacturing Plants

attributes.description: Three tire manufacturing plants in Mexico, operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Mexico- Tire Manufacturing Plants

attributes.description: Eleven tire manufacturing plants operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Europe- Tire Manufacturing Plants

attributes.description: Two tire manufacturing plants operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: South Africa- Tire Manufacturing Plants

attributes.description: Tire manufacturing plant operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Izmit, Turkey- Tire Manufacturing Plant

attributes.description: A tire retreading plant operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Australia- Tire Retreading Plant

attributes.description: Six tire manufacturing plants operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: China- Tire Manufacturing Plants

attributes.description: Tire manufacturing plant operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: India- Tire Manufacturing Plant

attributes.description: Tire manufacturing plant operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Taiwan- Tire Manufacturing Plant

attributes.description: There are two tire manufacturing plants in Indonesia, both belonging to Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Indonesia- Tire Manufacturing Plants

attributes.description: There are five tire manufacturing plants in Thailand, all operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Thailand- Tire Manufacturing Plants

attributes.description: There are ten tire manufacturing plants in Japan, all operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Japan- Tire Manufacturing Plants

attributes.description: This is the final natural rubber plant operated by Bridgestone, under the company Firestone Natural Rubber Company.  This location is the community I have focused on in my paper.
attributes.title: Harbel, Liberia- Natural Rubber Plant

attributes.description: Third natural rubber plant operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Songkhla, Thailand- Natural Rubber Plant

attributes.description: A second natural rubber plant located in Indonesia, operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Sumatra, Indonesia- Natural Rubber Plant

attributes.description: The first natural rubber plant that Bridgestone operates throughout the world.
attributes.title: Kalimantan, Indonesia- Natural Rubber Plant

attributes.description: A third synthetic rubber plant operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Huizhou, China- Synthetic Rubber Plant

attributes.description: This is the second synthetic rubber plant in the USA that Bridgestone operates.
attributes.title: Lake Charles, USA- Synthetic Rubber Plant

attributes.description: This is the first synthetic rubber plant operated by Bridgestone.  It is the first of two plants within the United States.
attributes.address: North Tennessee Bible Institute and Seminary, 3061 Hwy 41a S, Clarksville, TN 37043, USA
attributes.title: Clarksville, Tennesse- Synthetic Rubber Plant

attributes.description: This is where Marathwada Chemicals is located, which I have assumed is the type of organization in which Bridgestone acquires some of the chemicals needed to produce tires.  These chemicals include zinc stearate, wax, accelerators, and antioxidants and antiozonants.
attributes.title: Usmanpura, India- Chemical Supplies

attributes.description: This is where I have assumed Bridgestone purchases their sulfur.  Suncor energy produces sulfur as a by-product of oil refining.  This location seems suitable and accessible for Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Alberta, Canada- Sulfur Supply
Alberta, Canada- Sulfur Supply

attributes.description: The location of two Steel Cord plants in North Carolina, United States.
attributes.title: North Carolina, USA- Steel Cord Plant(s)

attributes.description: A seventh steel cord plant operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Woodstock, Canada- Steel Cord Plant

attributes.description: A sixth Steel Cord Plant operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Usansolo, Spain- Steel Cord Plant

attributes.description: A fifth Steel Cord plant operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Saga, Japan- Steel Cord Plant

attributes.description: A fourth Steel Cord Plant operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Kuroiso, Japan- Steel Cord Plant

attributes.description: Second Steel Cord Plan operated by Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Shenyang, China- Steel Cord Plant

attributes.description: One of Bridgestones Iron (Steel Cord) plants.  Readily available ingredient which supplies North American plants.
attributes.address: North Tennessee Bible Institute and Seminary, 3061 Hwy 41a S, Clarksville, TN 37043, USA
attributes.title: Clarksville, Tennesse- Steel Cord Plant

attributes.description: This is the third carbon black plant that Bridgestone operates.  It employs roughly 100 people of Mexico, and is the location used to supply the North American tire manufacturing plants.
attributes.title: Altamira, Mexico- Carbon Black Plant

attributes.description: A second carbon black plant operated by Bridgestone.  This plant is the Asahi Carbon Co. Ltd. and is a major subsidiary of Bridgestone.
attributes.title: Tokyo, Japan- Carbon Black Plant

attributes.description: This is the first carbon black plant that Bridgestone operates.  Carbon black is a key ingredient in the production of truck tires.
attributes.title: Rayong, Thailand- Carbon Black Plant

attributes.description: This is the main headquarters for the Bridgestone Group.  The CEO Masaaki Tsuya and his management team do their business from here.
attributes.title: Bridgestone Corporation Headquarters
